description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              What You Will Do
              
              The position requires a competitive Junior Sales Manager to develop sales strategies and attract new clients. You will source new sales opportunities and close sales to achieve quotas. You will play a key role in increasing income and revenue by managing and negotiating with clients, generating leads and qualifying prospects. This position will be the front-line contact between the company and the customer.
              

              - contact and visit potential customers daily (B2C, B2B)
              
              - introduce our products to customers
              
              - maintain and develop relationships with existing customers
              
              - negotiate and close sales
              
              - gather market and customer information
              
              - networking and keep in touch with construction/consultant/architect companies
              
              - liaise with process engineers
              
              - project management
              
              - do administrative work
              

              Basic salary + commission

Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              What You Are Good At
              
              - higher educational business degree or equivalent (BA in Business or MBA)
              
              - language requirement: conversational English, native Vietnamese
              
              - excellent sales and negotiation skills
              
              - good organizational and problem-solving skills
              
              - ability to communicate and do networking at all levels
              
              - enthusiasm, dynamism
              
              - independent personality
